item.title: From Conversation to Documentation: A Modern Dev Workflow with AI
item.description: We solve complex problems and then face the daunting task of writing documentation. What if the documentation wrote itself? Discover a workflow that turns a simple conversation with an AI into polished ADRs and blog posts, saving you hours.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Redesigning My Blog with an AI-Powered Workflow
item.description: My blog needed a facelift. Instead of weeks of manual CSS changes, I used Gemini for planning and GitHub Copilot for execution to completely redesign my site. Here's how the AI-assisted process worked.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Architecting C# Domain Models for Human and AI Collaboration
item.description: I went down a rabbit hole of extreme encapsulation in C# only to find a more pragmatic path. Discover the journey from a complex domain model to a simpler one that provides powerful guardrails for AI development tools like GitHub Copilot.
